  *          on Unity for integration with STM32Cube solution.

  ******************************************************************************
  @endverbatim

=======
### 10-March-2021 ###
========================
   + Unity v2.5.2 (https://github.com/ThrowTheSwitch/Unity) customized 
   + version for STM32Cube solution.

 * <h3><center>&copy; COPYRIGHT STMicroelectronics</center></h3>
 */
